name: Greedy Miner (IntrovertsDump)
description:
DESCRIPTION

Short game about a miner stuck in a underground maze. In order to keep moving you have to fuel you lantern. The goal is to escape from the mine, avoiding all the traps and collecting gold as you go.

Controlls: WASD, E to interact
Made by: EdwardTG, sunshine, introvertsdump
Music by: Goose Ninja
SFX by: Murkje
